CreateTeamRequest.name: CreateTeamRequest
CreateTeamRequest.description: CreateTeamRequest is the request to create a new team.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the team to create

CreateUserRequest.name: CreateUserRequest
CreateUserRequest.description: CreateUserRequest is the request to create a new user.

CreateUserResponse.name: CreateUserResponse
CreateUserResponse.description: CreateUserResponse is the response to a create user request.

DeviceCommand.name: DeviceCommand
DeviceCommand.description: DeviceCommand represents a command sent to an IoT device.

fields.name: deviceID
fields.description: DeviceID is the unique identifier of the target device

fields.name: command
fields.description: Command is the command to execute (e.g., "restart", "shutdown", "update_config")

DeviceStatus.name: DeviceStatus
DeviceStatus.description: DeviceStatus represents the status of an IoT device.

fields.name: deviceID
fields.description: DeviceID is the unique identifier of the device

fields.name: uptime
fields.description: Uptime is how long the device has been running in seconds

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp is when the status was reported

ErrorResponse.name: ErrorResponse
ErrorResponse.description: ErrorResponse is the unified error response type. It supports both simple errors (just message) and validation errors (message + field errors).

GetTeamRequest.name: GetTeamRequest
GetTeamRequest.description: GetTeamRequest is the request to get a team.

fields.name: teamID
fields.description: ID of the team to get

GetTeamResponse.name: GetTeamResponse
GetTeamResponse.description: GetTeamResponse is the response to a get team request.

PingResponse.name: PingResponse
PingResponse.description: PingResponse is the response to a ping request.

PingStatus.name: PingStatus
PingStatus.description: PingStatus represents the status of a ping request.

enumValues.description: PingStatusOK means the ping was successful.
PingStatusError means there was an error with the ping.

SensorTelemetry.name: SensorTelemetry
SensorTelemetry.description: SensorTelemetry represents generic sensor data from an IoT device.

fields.name: deviceID
fields.description: DeviceID is the unique identifier of the device

fields.name: sensorType
fields.description: SensorType is the type of sensor (e.g., "temperature", "humidity", "pressure")

fields.name: value
fields.description: Value is the sensor reading value

fields.name: unit
fields.description: Unit is the unit of measurement

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp is when the reading was taken

fields.name: quality
fields.description: Quality is the quality of the reading (0-100)

TemperatureReading.name: TemperatureReading
TemperatureReading.description: TemperatureReading represents a temperature sensor reading from an IoT device.

fields.name: deviceID
fields.description: DeviceID is the unique identifier of the device sending the reading

fields.name: temperature
fields.description: Temperature is the measured temperature value

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Timestamp is when the reading was taken

User.name: User
User.description: User represents a user in the system.

createTeam.description: Create a team by its name

deleteTeam.description: Create a team by its name

getTeam.description: Get a team by its ID

parameters.name: teamID
parameters.description: ID of the team to get

ping.description: Check if the server is alive

putTeam.description: Create a team by its name

topicParameters.name: deviceID
topicParameters.description: Unique identifier of the target device

topicParameters.name: sensorType
topicParameters.description: Type of sensor (e.g., humidity, pressure, motion)

publishSensorTelemetry.description: Publishes generic sensor telemetry data from IoT devices.

topicParameters.name: deviceID
topicParameters.description: Unique identifier of the device sending the temperature reading

publishTemperature.description: Publishes temperature readings from IoT devices. The device ID is part of the topic path.
publishTemperature.deprecated: This will be removed in the feature.

subscribeDeviceCommand.description: Receives commands sent to IoT devices for logging and monitoring.

subscribeDeviceStatus.description: Receives device status updates from all IoT devices.

subscribeSensorTelemetry.description: Receives generic sensor telemetry data from all IoT devices and sensor types.

subscribeTemperature.description: Receives temperature readings from all IoT devices.

database.schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "schema_migrations" (version varchar(128) primary key);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "user" (
  "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  "name" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "email" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "password" TEXT NOT NULL,
  "created_at" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  "updated_at" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
, "last_login" TIMESTAMP);
-- Dbmate schema migrations
INSERT INTO "schema_migrations" (version) VALUES
  ('20251009092116'),
  ('20251009104248');

openapiSpec:
components:
    schemas:
        CreateTeamRequest:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: CreateTeamRequest is the request to create a new team.
            properties:
                name:
                    description: Name of the team to create
                    type: string
            required:
                - name
            type: object
        CreateUserResponse:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: CreateUserResponse is the response to a create user request.
            properties:
                createdAt:
                    description: Creation timestamp
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                url:
                    description: URL to the user
                    format: uri
                    nullable: true
                    type: string
                userID:
                    description: ID of the created user
                    type: string
            required:
                - userID
                - createdAt
            type: object
        ErrorResponse:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: ErrorResponse is the unified error response type. It supports both simple errors (just message) and validation errors (message + field errors).
            properties:
                errors:
                    additionalProperties:
                        type: string
                    description: Field-level validation errors
                    type: object
                message:
                    description: High-level error message
                    type: string
                requestID:
                    description: Request ID for tracking
                    type: string
            required:
                - requestID
                - message
            type: object
        GetTeamRequest:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: GetTeamRequest is the request to get a team.
            properties:
                teamID:
                    description: ID of the team to get
                    type: string
            required:
                - teamID
            type: object
        GetTeamResponse:
            additionalProperties: false
            deprecated: true
            description: GetTeamResponse is the response to a get team request.
            properties:
                teamID:
                    description: ID of the team
                    type: string
                users:
                    description: Users in the team
                    items:
                        $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
                    type: array
            required:
                - teamID
                - users
            type: object
        PingResponse:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: PingResponse is the response to a ping request.
            properties:
                message:
                    description: Human-readable message
                    type: string
                metadata:
                    nullable: true
                    type: string
                status:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingStatus'
            required:
                - message
                - status
            type: object
        PingStatus:
            description: |
                PingStatus represents the status of a ping request.

                Possible values:
                - `OK`: PingStatusOK means the ping was successful.
                - `ERROR`: PingStatusError means there was an error with the ping.
            enum:
                - OK
                - ERROR
            type: string
        User:
            additionalProperties: false
            description: User represents a user in the system.
            properties:
                name:
                    deprecated: true
                    description: Name of the user
                    type: string
                userID:
                    description: ID of the user
                    type: string
            required:
                - userID
                - name
            type: object
info:
    description: Local API Documentation
    title: Local API
    version: vdev (unknown)
openapi: 3.0.3
paths:
    /api/ping:
        get:
            description: Check if the server is alive
            operationId: ping
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Success:
                                    value:
                                        message: Pong
                                        status: OK
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingResponse'
                    description: Successful ping response
                "413":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Request Entity Too Large:
                                    value:
                                        message: Request body too large (max 1MB)
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Request entity too large
                "500":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Database unreachable:
                                    value:
                                        message: Database unreachable
                                        status: ERROR
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingResponse'
                    description: Internal server error
            summary: Ping the server
            tags:
                - Core
    /api/team:
        delete:
            description: Create a team by its name
            operationId: deleteTeam
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        examples:
                            example-1:
                                value:
                                    name: My Team
                        schema:
                            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateTeamRequest'
                required: true
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        message: Pong
                                        status: OK
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingResponse'
                    description: Successful ping response
                "400":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        createdAt: "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                                        url: https://localhost:8080/user
                                        userID: "123"
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateUserResponse'
                    description: Invalid request
                "413":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Request Entity Too Large:
                                    value:
                                        message: Request body too large (max 1MB)
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Request entity too large
                "500":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Internal Server Error:
                                    value:
                                        message: Internal Server Error
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Internal Server Error
            summary: Create a team
            tags:
                - Team
        post:
            description: Create a team by its name
            operationId: createTeam
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        examples:
                            example-1:
                                value:
                                    name: My Team
                        schema:
                            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateTeamRequest'
                required: true
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        message: Pong
                                        status: OK
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingResponse'
                    description: Successful ping response
                "400":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        createdAt: "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                                        url: https://localhost:8080/user
                                        userID: "123"
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateUserResponse'
                    description: Invalid request
                "413":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Request Entity Too Large:
                                    value:
                                        message: Request body too large (max 1MB)
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Request entity too large
                "500":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Internal Server Error:
                                    value:
                                        message: Internal Server Error
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Internal Server Error
            summary: Create a team
            tags:
                - Team
        put:
            description: Create a team by its name
            operationId: putTeam
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        examples:
                            example-1:
                                value:
                                    name: My Team
                        schema:
                            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateTeamRequest'
                required: true
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        message: Pong
                                        status: OK
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingResponse'
                    description: Successful ping response
                "400":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        createdAt: "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                                        url: https://localhost:8080/user
                                        userID: "123"
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateUserResponse'
                    description: Invalid request
                "413":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Request Entity Too Large:
                                    value:
                                        message: Request body too large (max 1MB)
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Request entity too large
                "500":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Internal Server Error:
                                    value:
                                        message: Internal Server Error
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Internal Server Error
            summary: Create a team
            tags:
                - Team
    /api/team/{teamID}:
        get:
            deprecated: true
            description: Get a team by its ID
            operationId: getTeam
            parameters:
                - description: ID of the team to get
                  in: path
                  name: teamID
                  required: true
                  schema:
                    type: string
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        examples:
                            example-1:
                                value:
                                    teamID: abxc
                                    users:
                                        - name: ""
                                          userID: Asdf
                        schema:
                            $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTeamRequest'
                required: true
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        message: Pong
                                        status: OK
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingResponse'
                    description: Successful ping response
                "201":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        teamID: "123"
                                        users:
                                            - name: John
                                              userID: "123"
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTeamResponse'
                    description: Successful ping response
                "400":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                example-1:
                                    value:
                                        createdAt: "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                                        url: null
                                        userID: "123"
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateUserResponse'
                    description: Invalid request
                "413":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Request Entity Too Large:
                                    value:
                                        message: Request body too large (max 1MB)
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Request entity too large
                "500":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            examples:
                                Internal Server Error:
                                    value:
                                        message: Internal Server Error
                                        requestID: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
                    description: Internal Server Error
            summary: Get a team
            tags:
                - Team
servers:
    - description: Local server
      url: http://localhost:8080
